title: Covid: England braces for Plan B rule changes amid Omicron fears
content:
1. Covid: England braces for Plan B rule changes amid Omicron fears  BBC News
  2. Britain Introduces 'Plan B' Covid Measures to Tackle Omicron  The New York Times
  3. Boris Johnson calls for tighter COVID restrictions amid rise in omicron variant  Fox News
  4. PM introduces Covid rules whilst under fire for lockdown Christmas party - BBC Newsnight  BBC News
  5. ‘No one believed him’: Tory MPs mutinous over Johnson’s actions  The Guardian
